entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:14 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:14 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
